entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 19.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow early this evening. Blowing snow this evening and overnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 19. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow in the evening and after midnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
